sentence: In early trading on Thursday, shares of Nike ( NKE ) topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 0.9%.
Year to date, Nike has lost about 11.6% of its value.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Home Depot ( HD ), trading down 0.7%.
Home Depot is showing a gain of 2.9% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Exxon Mobil Corp. ( XOM ), trading down 0.2%, and Merck & Co. ( MRK ), trading up 0.8% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
